directions: Mix cream of mushroom soup, mushrooms, butter, and onion in a slow cooker; add beef tips.
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook egg noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 5 minutes. Drain.
Serve beef tips and sauce over cooked egg noodles.
ingredients: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans cream of mushroom soup
3 pounds beef tips, cut into bite-size pieces
title: Easy Slow Cooker Stroganoff
